    public class LocationTaskEditActivity
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
    This class is in charge of creating, viewing or editing a location task

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void checkPermissions()
      Checks if all the permissions for the map all enabled, if they are it moves to the "MapActivity" activity with the "getLocationLauncher" (which is a ActivityResultLauncher variable) if not, is requests the permissions that weren't enabled
      protected java.lang.String getPathFromUri(android.net.Uri contentUri)
      Gets the image's path from phone using passed Uri
      protected void initMiscellaneous()
      Initializes the miscellaneous layout (a BottomSheets layout) and does a few other operations: 1.
      boolean isServicesOK()
      Checks if google maps service is ok to use on device
      protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, android.content.Intent data)
      After sending the user to the setting to manually enable the request, it checks if user enabled the requests threw the settings
      protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState) 
      void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode, java.lang.String[] permissions, int[] grantResults)
      Requests the permissions in order to create a task
      protected void saveTaskLocation(int code)
      Saves the task to the database (adds, updates, deletes or completes depending on the code given) and goes back to the "TasksFragment" with the code (to show what kind of save was done)
      protected void selectImage()
      Allows the user to select a photo from his gallery
      protected void setStarsIcons(int numStars)
      Sets the image resources (outline or full) for all 5 of the star images in the task layout depending on the selected rating of the user
      protected void setStarsIconsDialog(int numStars, android.view.View view)
      Sets the image resources (outline or full) for all 5 of the star images in the "dialogAddStars" layout depending on the selected rating of the user
      protected void setSubtitleIndicatorColor()
      Sets the color of the task to the color picked in the BottomSheets
      protected void setViewOrUpdateTaskLocation()
      Sets the layout of an existing task that is opened by the user
      protected void showAddStarsDialog()
      Shows the "dialogAddStars" and adds the rating the user picked if the add button was clicked, if not it cancels the dialog
      protected void showAddURLDialog()
      Shows the "dialogAddURL" and adds the url the user picked if the add button was clicked (after checking its a valid url), if not it cancels the dialog
      protected void showCompleteTaskDialog()
      Shows the "dialogCompleteTasks" and calls the "saveTaskLocation" function with the complete request code if the complete button was pressed, if not it cancels the dialog
      protected void showDeleteStarsDialog()
      Shows the "dialogDeleteGeneral" and deletes the rating of the task if the delete button was clicked, if not it cancels the dialog
      protected void showDeleteTaskDialog()
      Shows the "dialogDeleteTaskLocation" and calls the "saveTaskLocation" function with the delete request code if the delete button was pressed, if not it cancels the dialog

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity

      • checkPermissions

        private void checkPermissions()
        Checks if all the permissions for the map all enabled, if they are it moves to the "MapActivity" activity with the "getLocationLauncher" (which is a ActivityResultLauncher variable) if not, is requests the permissions that weren't enabled

      • isServicesOK

        public boolean isServicesOK()
        Checks if google maps service is ok to use on device
        Returns:
        true if it is ok to use, false if it isn't

      • setViewOrUpdateTaskLocation

        protected void setViewOrUpdateTaskLocation()
        Sets the layout of an existing task that is opened by the user

      • saveTaskLocation

        protected void saveTaskLocation(int code)
        Saves the task to the database (adds, updates, deletes or completes depending on the code given) and goes back to the "TasksFragment" with the code (to show what kind of save was done)
        Parameters:
        code - The request code in order to know what type of save it is (add, update, delete, complete)

      • initMiscellaneous

        protected void initMiscellaneous()
        Initializes the miscellaneous layout (a BottomSheets layout) and does a few other operations: 1. Checks if BottomSheets was clicked, if so then it pops it up if its in "COLLAPSED" mode, and pushes it down if its in "EXPANDED" mode 2. Gets the color that was picked 3. Sets image "ic_done" to the selected color 4. If "availableTaskLocation" is initialized (existing task), then it performs a click on the right image depending on the color saved in the existing task 5. Checks if "layoutAddImageTask" is clicked. If it is, it checks if the permission to read external storage is permitted. If it is, the "select image" function is called, if not the permission is requested 6. Checks if "layoutAddUrlTask" is clicked. If it is, the "showAddURLDialog" function is called 7. Checks if "layoutAddStarsTask" is clicked. If it is, the "showAddStarsDialog" function is called 8. If "availableTaskLocation" is initialized (existing task) it checks if "layoutDeleteTask" is clicked. If it is, the "showDeleteTaskDialog" function is called

      • showDeleteTaskDialog

        protected void showDeleteTaskDialog()
        Shows the "dialogDeleteTaskLocation" and calls the "saveTaskLocation" function with the delete request code if the delete button was pressed, if not it cancels the dialog

      • showCompleteTaskDialog

        protected void showCompleteTaskDialog()
        Shows the "dialogCompleteTasks" and calls the "saveTaskLocation" function with the complete request code if the complete button was pressed, if not it cancels the dialog

      • showDeleteStarsDialog

        protected void showDeleteStarsDialog()
        Shows the "dialogDeleteGeneral" and deletes the rating of the task if the delete button was clicked, if not it cancels the dialog

      • setSubtitleIndicatorColor

        protected void setSubtitleIndicatorColor()
        Sets the color of the task to the color picked in the BottomSheets

      • selectImage

        protected void selectImage()
        Allows the user to select a photo from his gallery

      • onRequestPermissionsResult

        public void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode,
                                       @NonNull
                                       java.lang.String[] permissions,
                                       @NonNull
                                       int[] grantResults)
        Requests the permissions in order to create a task
        Specified by:
        onRequestPermissionsResult in interface androidx.core.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback
        Overrides:
        onRequestPermissionsResult in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        requestCode - Specifies each permission
        permissions - The requested permissions
        grantResults - The results of the permissions, if they were enabled or not

      • getPathFromUri

        protected java.lang.String getPathFromUri(android.net.Uri contentUri)
        Gets the image's path from phone using passed Uri
        Parameters:
        contentUri - The uri of the image selected by the user
        Returns:
        {String} The string of the image's path in order to store in the DB

      • showAddURLDialog

        protected void showAddURLDialog()
        Shows the "dialogAddURL" and adds the url the user picked if the add button was clicked (after checking its a valid url), if not it cancels the dialog

      • showAddStarsDialog

        protected void showAddStarsDialog()
        Shows the "dialogAddStars" and adds the rating the user picked if the add button was clicked, if not it cancels the dialog

      • setStarsIcons

        protected void setStarsIcons(int numStars)
        Sets the image resources (outline or full) for all 5 of the star images in the task layout depending on the selected rating of the user
        Parameters:
        numStars - The selected rating of the user

      • setStarsIconsDialog

        protected void setStarsIconsDialog(int numStars,
                                   android.view.View view)
        Sets the image resources (outline or full) for all 5 of the star images in the "dialogAddStars" layout depending on the selected rating of the user
        Parameters:
        numStars - The selected rating of the user
        view - The dialog's view

      • onActivityResult

        protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                int resultCode,
                                @Nullable
                                android.content.Intent data)
        After sending the user to the setting to manually enable the request, it checks if user enabled the requests threw the settings
        Overrides:
        onActivityResult in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        requestCode - Specifies each permission
        resultCode - The result code of the requested permissions
        data - The data of the intent that was used to send the user to the phone's settings permissions
